mapper.select: SELECT ra.*, ca.id ca_id, ca.address_name ca_address_name, ca.`name` ca_name, ca.phone ca_phone, ca.province ca_province, ca.city ca_city, ca.region ca_region, ca.detail_address ca_detail_address FROM `order_return_apply` ra LEFT JOIN `company_address` ca ON ra.company_address_id = ca.id WHERE ra.id=#{id};
